definitions.body: cleansing, purification, of leper Le 13:7, Le 13:35, Le 14:2, Le 14:23, Le 14:32; of Nazirite Nu 6:9; from an issue Le 15:13 (all P); from contact with the dead Ez Eze 44:26; of sacred things in gen. 1Ch 23:28; of persons for the passover 2Ch 30:19; [[מִשְׁמֶרֶת הַטָּהֳרָה]] Ne 12:45 the charge, requirement of purification.
